rooms.description: North-facing entrance with Vastu alignment ensuring positive energy flow. The space includes a reception area, shoe area and an open corridor connecting to other rooms.
Spacious living area integrated with a home office space. Utilizes natural light through large windows and integrates traditional Chettinad interior elements.
Fully equipped kitchen designed in a semi-open style adjacent to the living area. Incorporates Chettinad design motifs and traditional materials.
Dining area adjacent to the living room. Can be used for casual meals and gatherings.
A dedicated home office space designed for quiet work. Features a desk with built-in storage, ergonomic chair and ample natural lighting.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor plan. Ensures easy access and storage space.
A dedicated library area for relaxation and reading. Incorporates traditional Chettinad woodwork and ambient lighting.
Well-appointed bathroom located conveniently near living areas. Ensures privacy and functionality.

openings.description: Large entrance door facing north to adhere to Vastu principles for positive energy.
Large windows in the living room and home office for ample natural light, aligning with Chettinad aesthetics.
Door connecting to the garage from the ground floor. Provides easy access and ventilation.
